System requirements: Processor with a clock speed of 1.5 GHz or higher 
Recommended RAM - 1 GB or more 
required 18 GB of disk space DVD-ROM drive 
Keyboard and mouse Monitor resolution 800/600 or higher 
Video Card - 128MB 
Description: The assembly was based on the original image of Microsoft Windows 7 x86/x64. 
In one way there are 12 editorial: 
Were integrated updates on April 8, 2014.install.wim compressed format (install.esd)

Features assemblies:

No programs were not established 
added USB3, Sata and network drivers.

In the final step:
KB890930 
Defender Updates

On activation:
At the last stage of the installation window appears WPI 
If you want to activate Windows, select "Activation" 
If not, just click on "Exit". 
My advice: be sure to select "Activation" on this WPI and your Windows will be activated without any problems. 
Just case in the archive there is an activator Windows Loader 2.2.1 by Daz

Installing the software:
With WPI-window, you'll be able to install additional software. 
Simply select the program you want to install and click on "Start Installation" 
If for any reason you missed the installation WPI, you can run it later, it is located in the image  sources  $ oem $

Composition mini WPI:
Google Chrome

[Turn]

or burn it to DVD at slow speed
